title: Comparing spatial patterns using moving window approach
text: plot chunk unnamed-chunk-14 plot chunk unnamed-chunk-14
code: calculate_cove_focal = function(landscape_values, raster_window) {   extract_cove = function(x, classes){     comat::get_cove(comat::get_coma(x, classes = classes), ordered = FALSE, normalization = "pdf")   }   raster_window[!is.na(raster_window)] <- landscape_values[!is.na(raster_window)]   result = extract_cove(x = raster_window, classes = 1:9)   return(result) } system.time({ lc92sb = terra::focal(x = lc92, w = dim(window), silent = FALSE, fun = calculate_cove_focal, raster_window = window) lc18sb = terra::focal(x = lc18, w = dim(window), silent = FALSE, fun = calculate_cove_focal, raster_window = window) lc_compare1b = spq_compare(lc92sb, lc18sb, dist_fun = "jensen-shannon") }) #>  |---------|---------|---------|---------| =========================================                                             |---------|---------|---------|---------| =========================================                                            #>    user  system elapsed  #> 529.393  41.362 572.468 plot(c(lc_compare, lc_compare1b)) plot(c(lc_compare - lc_compare1b)) # c1d1 = resample(c1["dist"], lc_compare) # c1d2 = resample(c1["dist"], lc_compare, method = "near")
